Welcome to Grove’s documentation!¶

Grove is a genetic algorithm and grammatical evolution framework heavily influenced by and specialized for swarm-based models. It includes a simple, extendable 2D simulator for experimenting with a variety of foraging tasks (aggregation, foraging, etc...), extensive data collection customizability, and numerous ways to represent formal grammars.
